name: 60 Seconds!
summary:
As Ted, a responsible citizen and a family man, you are faced with a slight disturbance to your happy, suburban lifestyle. THE NUCLEAR APOCALYPSE.

With only 60 seconds left to impact, guide Ted in a mad, intense and action packed dash through his house in search of his family and useful supplies. Everything will be against you - time, your very own furniture, the house that's different every time you play and the fundamental question - what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time and alive is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

name: 60 Parsecs!
summary: 60 Parsecs! is an Atomic Space Age adventure of scavenge and survival. Keep your crew alive and ready for action. Make difficult choices, face soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. And maybe reach your destination. Or not.

name: 6000-nin no Sensei-tachi ga Tsukutta Tanoshii Shougakkou Tanken 2
summary: 6000-nin no Sensei-tachi ga Tsukutta Tanoshii Shougakkou Tanken 2 is a Sega Pico educational game. It is the sequel to 6000-nin no Sensei-tachi ga Tsukutta Tanoshii Shougakkou Tanken 1.

name: 60 Tons
summary: 60 Tons is an exciting action packed multiplayer PC FPS tank game. Four teams of five tanks battle each other for dominance in a small futuristic arena.

name: 60 Second Strike
summary: A shooter you can play for minutes or hours at a time, 60 Second Strike offers a refreshing new take on classic old-school gameplay. When time is your life--how long can you last?

name: 60 Seconds! Atomic Adventure
summary:
60 Seconds! is a dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival. Collect supplies and rescue your family before the nuke hits. Stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, ration food and hunt mutant cockroaches. And maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds! requires at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2.

As Ted, a responsible citizen and a family man, you are faced with a slight disturbance to your happy, suburban lifestyle. THE NUCLEAR APOCALYPSE.

With only 60 seconds left to impact, guide Ted in a mad, intense and action packed dash through his house in search of his family and useful supplies. Everything will be against you - time, your very own furniture, the house that's different every time you play and the fundamental question - what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time and alive is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

EXPERIENCE
the suburbian nightmare of a nuke dropping down on your neighbourhood in this atomic, dark comedy set in 1950s.

SCAVENGE
any supplies, you will need to survive, and family members in a 60 second rush through your randomly generated house.

PREPARE
for the worst. Don’t just grab arbitrary items, plan your survival and follow helpful tips from emergency broadcasts!

SURVIVE
in a fallout shelter with whatever you brought with you. How many days will you last? Will everyone make it out alive?

DECIDE
what to do, when the post-apocalyptic world pushes you to the corner. Will you risk going outside? Who is not eating dinner, when barely any food is left? How do you deal with a mutant cockroach infestation?

name: 60 Seconds to Survive
summary:
Are you ready to survive? Let’s check it now! Download our new 60 Seconds Survivor Escape game, gather vital objects in a really limited time and learn your readiness level! Collect necessary tools, weapons and supplies for your perfect survival and just have fun with this hidden object adventure underground game!

Do you know that everybody should have so-called emergency supplies for extreme situations? Of course, you do! So it’s time to start collecting tool for your own stuff in case of some catastrophe! Do your best and find all the required items at your large house, and remember: you have only 60 seconds! Hurry up grabbing such objects as water, batteries, documents, money, knife, first aid kit and some others!

Make haste, but be wise and careful: some items are useless (like a rubber duck, for example), so they can increase the weight of your survival bag! Check two game modes: free mode, where you should collect as much tools and supplies as it even possible in 60 seconds; and mission mode, where you should find all objects from your special list! Play 60 Seconds Survivor Escape game and have fun with this be ready app!

Earn points for successfully found supplies and unlock new skins for your character! Buy some boosters which can increase your time so you’ll have more chances to win this game! Enjoy colorful graphics and exciting atmosphere!

name: 60 Seconds! Reatomized
summary:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring 4K support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.
Fruit season has started! Harvest them to make a new record. Show what you are really worth in this crazy time run! You have only 6 seconds to complete level, and to become the master farmer.

name: 600Seconds: The Deep Church
summary: Awakening before a church stood in the middle of a meadow, Mutsuki follows a white cat inside and begins to explore. Their wristwatch reads 23:50, on the 15th of July 1927. After 600 seconds have passed, Mutsuki must defeat the monsters that appear and escape from this nightmare.

name: 60 Parseconds! Bundle
summary: The dark comedy atomic adventure duo: 60 Seconds! Reatomized and 60 Parsecs!. Scavenge, make difficult decisions and maybe survive. Or not.

name: 60 Seconds Hero
summary:
A Real 'God' Tier Idle RPG!

Earth just got destroyed... but don't worry!
Sign a contract with Time Goddess to rewind the time!
Now it's your turn to become a hero and save the planet!

name: 60-in-1 Game Collection
summary: 60 thrilling games to test your reflexes, memory, and skill. Play this compendium of fun games alone or compete with others. The world's most diverse collection of mini-games on Nintendo Switch is attractively priced to suit every pocket.

name: 60 Seconds Burger Run
summary: Hurry Up! Get fatso to his favorite burger bar within the next 60 seconds in great and hard retro platform game. Use your weight to break blocks!

600 is a maze game where the player is a turtle trying to bring baby turtles, called 'kidturtles' to their homes while avoiding beetles. Scattered throughout the maze are boxes with question marks on them. When the player walks over a question mark, a baby turtle will crawl onto the main turtle's back, a house will appear at a random location on the map, and the player will have to bring the baby turtle to its house while avoiding beetles.

Other times, beetles will come out of the boxes, which the player will have to quickly run away from. The player's only offensive move is the ability to drop "smart bombs" to temporarily stun the beetles. The player's smart bombs can be refilled by grabbing the smart bombs in the middle of the maze. However, unlike actual smart bombs, the player's bombs do not move and stay in a single place until a beetle runs over it.

You have eight floors to deal with the beetles, then you'll go to the roof to get your baby turtles, after you go get them, you walk home with the rest of the baby turtles you collected. The game pattern is endless.

name: 60 Seconds Santa Run
summary: It's almost Christmas and Santa is very late this year! Make it to your toy factory before the time runs out!

name: 60FPS Kitten
summary:
60FPS Kitten is a difficult patience-action game where you're a kitten that moves at 60FPS!

How far can you get before you give up in despair?

name: 60 Clicks: Read, Select, Connected Worlds
summary: This is a Short Visual Novel, that ends the story by your 60 clicks, and in full Live2D animation. Choose the options that appear again and again, to interact with the heroine. Repeat the story, understanding the mysteries, and fall in love with her.

name: 60 Second Game Challenge
summary:
How long can you play this game?
One-button-action at its finest.

name: 60 Minute Marathon
summary: You've heard of wads with three hour maps. You've heard of wads with one hour maps. But here today we give you a vanilla, 32-map megawad made entirely in one hour and streamed on twitch.

name: 60 Seconds to Park
summary: Birds-eye car parking simulator.

name: 60 Minute Marathon 2
summary: 60 Minute Marathon 2 is a 74-map MBF21-compatible gigawad made (mostly) in a single hour, just like last time, but with more than twice the friends, including me, @Synami, and new friends @Phoenyx and @OverflowingMocha, twice the "production quality" as last time, and even a completely bespoke soundtrack made by Phoenyx! Much like the first 60 Minute Marathon, this was mostly a fairly simple yet somewhat extreme mapping exercise, this time with four mappers all making 16 maps over an hour and deciding to jam them all together at the end alternating between each mapper, with maps only being edited after the designated hour to actually make them possible.

name: 60 Seconds to Escape
summary: You are trapped in an escape room, the timer is counting down, you only have one minute to escape the room ! Find clues and note them down, the room resets but not the note pad ! Keep it up, I have faith in you !

name: 60 BPM
summary: 60 Beats per Minute is the rhythm of a healthy heart at rest, but be ready to speed it up! Play 42 levels by tapping on-beat with the music following sound and visual cues. Enjoy spectacular surprises, with soothing music and visuals from the calm of a starry night to the rush of heated battles!

name: 60 Second History
summary: 60 Second History is a game where you play a series of minigames to create your own messed up timeline. History changes depending on how you play the game, from little cosmetic details to entire separate branches of history with their own unique minigames. After six ten-second minigames, you'll be shown an ending that tells you what your version of the future is like.

name: 60 Seconds! Souper Scavenger
summary: In the atomic wasteland there is but one god: SOUP. Run fast, jump high, and scavenge like crazy, or there will be no soup for you. Survive the dangers of the postapocalypse, bring back all the soup you can find, and become the SOUPER SCAVENGER.

name: 60 Minutes to Extinction: Escape Room
summary: You have exactly 60 minutes to save humanity from nuclear extinction. There are no second attempts. No manual saves. Explore a collapsing bunker, repair critical systems, and solve puzzles under pressure. Succeed or watch the world end.

name: 60 Below
summary: 60 Below is a single player survival horror game where you are tasked with repairing and maintaining the equipment in an underground facility to bring it back online and make sure you survive the new ice age. But be careful, as something wants to claim the facility for itself.
